item.title: Using symlink to change R versions
item.description: Switching between R versions on macOS can be difficult and annoying. One way to deal with multiple versions of R is via the command line. Start by taking a look at what is available on your local machine. cd /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions ls -l drwxrwxr-x 6 root admin 192 Jan 17 2019 3.2 drwxrwxr-x 6 root admin 192 Jan 18 2019 3.3 drwxrwxr-x 3 root admin 96 Mar 18 2020 3.5 drwxrwxr-x 6 root admin 192 Mar 18 2020 3.
